LanguageData.JCC_Welcome: This mod settings window will change both inventory capacity and carrying capacity settings for both existing and new saves by modifying the vanilla formulas.
LanguageData.JCC_AllowBodySizeMultiplierTooltip: By default, this is left as true.
LanguageData.JCC_CarryCapacityMultiplierTooltip: By default, this is 1x. Changing this will multiply the value by the number selected
LanguageData.JCC_StatInfoMultiplier: Jec's Inventory and Carrying Capacity Settings multiplier: {0}.
LanguageData.JCC_StatInfoBodySizeMultiplierDisabled: The multiplier for body size for carrying capacity has been disabled in Jec's Inventory and Carrying Capacity Settings mod.
